Text:
Can anybody comment on the subtitles, are the subs really HARDCODED? I'm asking because there are .srt subtitles included with this torrent... and I'm just wondering why the extra subs if it already has hardcoded subs... or the uploader just doesn't know the meaning on hardcoded subs :)

But thanks for the upload anyhow!

Dowloaded it and can confirm it has hardcoded english subtitles. The .srt subtitles have only the additions for the hearing impaired and no dialoque. 
A/V quality is very good. Great upload.
